title: Book your place on one of our consultation events
authors: Nicola Lewellen - FMP Engagement and Communications
categories: North Sea and Channel sprat FMP
Southern North Sea and Channel skates and rays FMP
Southern North Sea demersal non-quota FMP

content.text: Last week we launched consultations on our next five draft FMPs.
We’re happy to now announce dates for our consultation events- where the fisheries management plans team will be available to talk about these plans in more detail.
Join us to share your views on the draft plans and feed them into the consultations.
At events before 21 November, there will also be an opportunity to feed in views about the consultation about amending the FMP deadlines.
Our teams will be at the following locations over the next couple of months to talk about the FMP/s listed:
​​Book your place at one of these events here: https://www.eventbrite.com/cc/fisheries-management-plans-events-2053129
(online events will be added to our Eventbrite page soon)
Looking forward to seeing you there!
